---
Help: Het item in de response van GET /schedule/net/{net}/now zendt uit ten tijde van de waarde van de 'now' parameter op het opgegeven net.
Suites: NPOAPI-36, RG
Test
---
!*> Test-specific items
!define net1 {ZAPP}
!define net2 {ZAPPE}

!define now1Iso {2020-05-26T17:00:00+02:00}
!define now2Iso {2020-05-26T15:00:00+02:00}
!define now1 {26-5-2020 17:00}
!define now2 {26-5-2020 15:00}
*!

|script                              |
|ensure|iso|${now1Iso}|equals|${now1}|
|ensure|iso|${now2Iso}|equals|${now2}|

|script                                                                                                                            |
|Get                                                     |schedule/net/${net1}/now?now=${now1Iso}|and check value at|net|is|${net1}|
|Check item in response is broadcasting at moment of time|${now1}                                                                  |

|script                                                                                                                            |
|Get                                                     |schedule/net/${net2}/now?now=${now2Iso}|and check value at|net|is|${net2}|
|Check item in response is broadcasting at moment of time|${now2}                                                                  |
